product_name: PURE Special Canada Edition Stainless Steel Classic Double Wall Water Bottle, 17 oz, White
description: CAPACITY: Insulated water bottle can hold up to 500ml (17oz) in volume to offer maximum hydration for any activity, the perfect size to bring anywhere MATERIAL: Made of durable, high-quality 18/8 stainless steel with a double-walled design that offers insulation to keep your hot and cold drinks secure VERSATILE: Insulated water bottle is great to bring camping, for every workout including cycling, yoga, spin, boxing, HIIT, and everyday use at home FEATURE: Thermal water bottle's double-insulation feature provides condensation-free & leak-proof benefits to keep your drinks hot/cold for 12-24 hours DESIGN: Stainless steel bottle's Canadian-inspired design allows you to bring a piece of home anywhere -- the perfect and essential hydration accessory
latest_reviews: I am really very happy with the products! The paintings and the colors are of very good quality!
The much was scratched and the sticky tags were so hard to cleaned off. The product will do what it’s intended.
